api_conventions.auth: Bearer JWT (Supabase Auth) dengan kewajiban MFA untuk admin.
api_conventions.idempotency: Wajib menggunakan header Idempotency-Key untuk operasi POST seperti payout, approve, dan finalize.
api_conventions.errors: Format JSON standar dengan kode (VALIDATION_ERROR, UNAUTHORIZED, dll) dan pesan detail.

public_user: Auth & Profile: Link/verify wallet, set primary wallet.
Launchpad: Browse projects, stats, timeline, dan partisipasi (contribute/claim/refund).
Bonding Curve: Quote swap, swap execution, dan event stream untuk chart.
Social-Fi: Feed posts (hanya Blue Check), likes, dan report content.
Rewards & Badges: Referral stats, claim rewards (gate: Blue Check), dan katalog badge.
Staking: SBT status, claim SBT (fee $10), register/unregister staking, dan reward claim.
developer_creator: Onboarding: Submit KYC per project (video + ID + payment hash).
Creation: Configure dan deploy presale/fairlaunch (gate: KYC + SC Scan) serta bonding curve.
admin_edge_functions: Security: Enforce MFA dan manajemen role (SUPER_ADMIN).
Operations: KYC queue management, project control (pause/cancel), fee rules, treasury management.
Payout & Mod: Persetujuan payout (two-man rule), moderasi feed (ban/remove), dan manual badge issue.

gate_rules.social: Hanya user Blue Check ACTIVE yang bisa membuat post di feed.
gate_rules.rewards: Hanya user Blue Check ACTIVE yang bisa klaim reward referral.
gate_rules.payout: Semua pembayaran otomatis dikirim ke primary wallet user di profil.

done_definition: Daftar endpoint lengkap untuk user, developer, dan admin dengan gate rules dan konvensi keamanan yang terpenuhi.
